column6: - Love is in Jersey City as Valentine's Day arrives! Kamala Khan may not be allowed to go to the dance, but Ms. Marvel is! Well sort of â€" by crashing it attempting to capture Asgard's most annoying trickster! Yup, it's a special Valentine's Day issue featuring Marvel's favorite charlatan, Loki!
